form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Begich introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To enhance the safety of drug-free playgrounds.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Drug-Free Playgrounds Safety Enhancement Act of 2014.
Section 419 of the Controlled Substances Act (21 U.S.C. 860) is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by striking video arcade facility and inserting video amusement game facility; and

clause.text: by striking outdoor facility and inserting outdoor area;
by striking three or more separate and inserting 1 or more;
by inserting play structures, after not limited to,; and

by striking and teeterboards and inserting seesaw, merry-go-round, slides, jungle gym, chin-up bars, sandbox, spring rider, monkey bars, overhead ladders, trapeze rings, playhouses, rope bridges, and mazes; and

subparagraph.text: by amending paragraph (3) to read as follows:

paragraph.text: The term video amusement game facility means any facility, legally accessible to persons under 18 years of age, intended primarily for amusement, which contains video game machines or other similar youth games.
